Package FAXE

Class FAXE

java.lang.Object
se.gu.faxe.FAXE
public class FAXE
extends java.lang.Object
This class offers the access to the library functions to extract embedded annotations of your project/source code.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    FAXE()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main function for testing purposes

    • extractEAfromRootDirectory

      public static java.util.List<EmbeddedAnnotation> extractEAfromRootDirectory​(java.lang.String rootDirectory)
      Method to extract embedded annotations from given root directory. The root directory and all sub-directories are checked for EA in source code, files and folders. In addition the hierarchy file is analysed.
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - String of root directory.
      Returns:
      List of found embedded annotations.

    • extractEAfromSourceCode

      public static java.util.List<EmbeddedAnnotation> extractEAfromSourceCode​(java.lang.String fileToAnalyze)
      Method to extract embedded annotations on source code level of given file.
      Parameters:
      fileToAnalyze - String of to be analyzed file.
      Returns:
      List of found embedded annotations.

    • extractEAfromFeatureFile

      public static java.util.List<EmbeddedAnnotation> extractEAfromFeatureFile​(java.lang.String fileUnderTest)
      Method to extract embedded annotations on file level of given file.
      Parameters:
      fileUnderTest - String of to be analyzed file.
      Returns:
      List of found embedded annotations.

    • extractEAfromFeatureFolder

      public static java.util.List<EmbeddedAnnotation> extractEAfromFeatureFolder​(java.lang.String folderUnderTest)
      Method to extract embedded annotations on folder level of given folder.
      Parameters:
      folderUnderTest - String of to be analyzed folder.
      Returns:
      List of found embedded annotations.

    • parseCodeAnnotationLine

      static boolean parseCodeAnnotationLine​(java.lang.String line)
      Takes input String and checks if valid according to code annotation grammar.
      Parameters:
      line - source code line under verification
      Returns:
      true when valid ; false when invalid

    • parseFileAnnotationLine

      static boolean parseFileAnnotationLine​(java.lang.String line)
      Takes input String and checks if valid according to file annotation grammar.
      Parameters:
      line - source code line under verification
      Returns:
      true when valid ; false when invalid

    • parseFolderAnnotationLine

      static boolean parseFolderAnnotationLine​(java.lang.String line)
      Takes input String and checks if valid according to folder annotation grammar.
      Parameters:
      line - source code line under verification
      Returns:
      true when valid ; false when invalid

    • serializeEAList2JSON

      public static org.json.JSONArray serializeEAList2JSON​(java.util.List<EmbeddedAnnotation> eaList)
      Transforms list of EmbeddedAnnotation to JSON object.
      Parameters:
      eaList - List of EmbeddedAnnotation
      Returns:
      JSON object out of parameter.

    • deserializeEAList2JSON

      public static java.util.List<EmbeddedAnnotation> deserializeEAList2JSON​(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray)
      Transforms JSON object to list of EmbeddedAnnotation
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - JSON object
      Returns:
      List of EmbeddedAnnotation out of parameter.
